The City of Bowie election will be November 3, 2026.

Councilor, Precinct 1- Brandon Walker

Councilor, Precinct 2 - Laura Sproles

* Councilor, Precinct 3 -Laramie Truax

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact Sandy Page, City Secretary, 307 N. Mason St. Bowie, Tx 76230

Monday-Thursday 7:00 am - 6:00 pm.

940-872-1114 ext. 121. or email spage@cityofbowietx.com
